General.Name: Truly International Holdings Limited
General.Description: Truly International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, sells, and trades in liquid crystal display products and electronic consumer products. It operates through two segments, LCD Products and Electronic Consumer Products. The company offers touch panel products and modules; compact camera modules; personal care products, including electric toothbrushes, blood glucose monitors, and blood pressure monitors; calculators and electronic components; printed and flexible circuit board panels, and plastic injection molding products for various applications; cover lens; health care products; and fingerprint identification modules and electrical devices. It serves in the People's Republic of China, South Korea, Japan, Hong Kong, Europe, and internationally. The company is headquartered in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Chung Shun Knitting Centre, Kwai Chung, Hong Kong
